name: SynopsysDetectTask
description: Execute Synopsys Detect against your build
author: Synopsys
instanceNameFormat: Run Synopsys Detect for your build $(message)

inputs.name: Products
inputs.label: Run Detect For The Following Products
inputs.helpMarkDown: Detect supports multiple Synopsys Products. All selected products will require configuration.

inputs.name: BlackDuckService
inputs.label: Black Duck Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Black Duck end point to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Black Duck'

inputs.name: BlackDuckProxyService
inputs.label: Black Duck Proxy Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Black Duck proxy to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Black Duck Proxy'

inputs.name: PolarisService
inputs.label: Polaris Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Polaris end point to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Polaris'

inputs.name: DetectVersion
inputs.label: Detect Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the detect binary to use. Default: Latest.

inputs.name: DetectArguments
inputs.label: Detect Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional detect arguments. Newline or space to seperate. Use double quotes to escape. Can use environment and build variables.

inputs.name: DetectFolder
inputs.label: Detect Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to download the detect jar or the location of an existing detect jar. Default: System temp directory.

inputs.name: AddTaskSummary
inputs.label: Add Detect Task Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, will add a summary of the detect task to the build summary tab.
